description: Rurouni Kenshin Memorial was released back on December 18th, 1999. The DVD special was a clip show which included some new footage of Kenshin, Kaoru and their son Kenji, as well as it featured additional dialogue to close out the story of the Rurouni Kenshin TV series.

titles.title: 逆刃刀の記憶 ~新しき世代に想いを託して~
